original_title: The Shaolin Kid: A Boy In China
overview: The story of a six year old boy from Phoenix, Arizona whose dreams of becoming a Kungfu master lead him to the birthplace of martial arts - the legendary Shaolin Temple in China. His father must now face a heartbreaking decision and follow his son to China leaving the mother behind in America... a choice few parents could ever imagine.
tagline: The incredible story of a boy who became a kung fu superstar
title: The Shaolin Kid: A Boy In China
